alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:21PM MDT until May 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Central Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Southeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 521 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Fort Laramie to 6 miles southwest of Lingle to 6 miles east of Chugwater, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lingle, Fort Laramie, Chugwater, Yoder, Veteran, Slater and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
